item.title: en평행한 두 직선 사이의 거리를 구하는 공식 유도
item.description: Formula $$ d=\frac { |2k| }{ \sqrt { m^{ 2 }+1 } } $$ Explanation When solving problems related to finding the tangent of a quadratic curve, there is often a need to determine the distance between two tangents. While there is a formula for finding the distance between a point and a line, it is not inherently difficult. However, knowing a formula that can quickly and easily calculate this
